workflows.name: Voice Command Dispatch
workflows.context: User interacts with VoiceOrb on yace19ai.com. Requires NLP interpretation and agent delegation.
workflows.predicate: Input is detected by SpeechRecognition webkit and user finishes speaking (orbState transitions to processing).
workflows.successCriteria: Response generated by ASiReM and rendered via TTS, returning orbState to `idle`.

workflows.name: Continuous Semantic Knowledge Crawl
workflows.context: Documentation Agent reads PrimeAI network for updates. Triggers every 2-5 minutes or on git push.

inputSchema.urls: array of strings (hostnames and repo pages)

workflows.successCriteria: Prime Semantic Graph JSON dumped locally and propagated to Cognee Memory Fusion layer. New blueprints generated.
